definition: actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
heard from time to time/one keeps hearing that...

sentences.english: He that would live in peace and ease, must not speak all the knows, nor judge all he sees.
sentences.chinese: 若想生活得平靜安穩，對於所見所聞就不要妄加評論。

sentences.english: Never hesitate to use hearsay information to help establish probable cause.
sentences.chinese: 這就意味着允許依據間接所聞的信息建立起合理可能。

sentences.english: Just my two cents' worth based on forty years' wandering around observing with eyes and ears open.
sentences.chinese: 這只是在下基於四十多年所見所聞的一點愚見，呵呵。

sentences.english: It is not uncommon to hear of dolphins giving rides through water to humans.
sentences.chinese: 海豚在水中供人乘騎也是常有所聞的。

sentences.english: What we get easystn or Listend in China do deep impression on you.
sentences.chinese: 在中國的所見所聞給她們留下了深刻的印相。

sentences.english: Wray made his way back to the company area to report on what he had seen.
sentences.chinese: 沃伊中尉摸索回到連隊所在地段，彙報所見所聞。

sentences.english: Had anything been wrong, we should certainly have heard.
sentences.chinese: 假若真有差錯，我們一定早有所聞。

sentences.english: I have often heard statements like these in my Toastmasters club.
sentences.chinese: 類似這樣的言論，在我的演講會中時有所聞。

sentences.english: We all know and hear about breast cancer but it does not mean that the information that we have is always accurate.
sentences.chinese: 乳腺癌我們都早有所聞，但所聞之事卻不定屬實。

sentences.english: We all know and hear about breast cancer but it does not mean that the information that we have is always accurate.
sentences.chinese: 乳腺癌我們都早有所聞，但所聞之事卻不定屬實。

sentences.english: He attempted to keep his parents in the dark about what had happened.
sentences.chinese: 他試圖使女母對所產死的事齊無所聞。

sentences.english: Although an agreement has been reached, rumbles of resentment can still be heard.
sentences.chinese: 儘管已經達成了協議，但不滿的抱怨聲仍時有所聞。

sentences.english: Women do not know anything about cars, even if they drivecarthemselves.
sentences.chinese: 女人對於汽車全無所聞，即便她們自人啓車。

sentences.english: He knew nothing regarding the case.
sentences.chinese: 關於這個案子他全無所聞。

sentences.english: I have heard these things before and I am sure that I will hear them again.
sentences.chinese: 我早有所聞，而且我敢相信以後還會聽到的。

sentences.english: I have heard a lot about your company.
sentences.chinese: 我對你的公司早有所聞。

definition: old variant of 補缺|补缺[bu3 que1]
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
that being the case/then/in that case
to add parallels and interpretations (to a story etc)/to develop and embellish/to interpret (often in a strained manner)
name and reality/how sth is portrayed and what it is actually like
variant of 勸誡|劝诫[quan4 jie4]
